description: Nervive comes from the World's #1 Selling Nerve Care Company‡ and we’ve taken our 50+ years of expertise in global nerve care to create NERVIVE NERVE HEALTH. Nervive Nerve Health is specially formulated with Alpha-Lipoic acid to promote healthy blood flow* and Vitamins B12, B6, and B1 to fortify your nerve health*. Nervive Nerve Health supports critical components of nerve health* with B Complex Vitamins that nourish nerves, enhance neurotransmission, and build nerve insulation. All Nervive products are sugar free and only 1 tablet needed per day; 30-day supply included. Try Nervive Nerve Health and see how you can get back to living your life how you want to. Also available: Nerve Relief that helps to relive occasional nerve aches*† and Nerve Relief PM, which also contains melatonin to help you sleep*. *THESE STATEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION. THIS PRODUCT IS NOT INTENDED TO DIAGNOSE, TREAT, CURE, OR PREVENT ANY DISEASE. †Helps with occasional nerve aches, weakness, & discomfort due to natural changes in nerves with aging ‡ Nicholas Hall’s global CHC Database, DB6, 2021 value sale at MSP
